history.proof: intros d hd tl a la ls. unfold essence_list. simpl. destruct ls. - sfirstorder depth: 3. - hauto lq: on drew: off use: Nat.max_l, Nat.le_ge_cases, Nat.le_0_l, Nat.add_le_mono, le_n_S, Nat.add_1_r, Nat.max_r.

ctx: intros d hd tl a la ls.
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA hd : term tl : term_list a : ad la : prec_list a0 : ad ls1, ls2 : prec_list Unable to unify "S (taille_0 la + taille_0 (prec_cons a0 ls1 ls2) + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) * S (DTA_taille d)))" with "S (taille_0 (prec_cons a0 ls1 ls2) + S (DTA_taille d + Nat.max (term_high hd) (term_high_0 tl) * S (DTA_taille d)))".

ctx: intros d hd tl a la ls.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros d hd tl a la ls. unfold essence_list. simpl. destruct ls. - apply le_n. - destruct p. destruct la as [a' la' ls']. apply le_S. apply Nat.add_le_mono. + apply taille_aux_1. + apply Nat.mul_le_mono; apply Nat.add_le_mono; apply high_aux_3.
